methods.name: getDocumentElement
methods.description: This is a convenience attribute that allows direct access to the child node that is the root element of the document.

methods.name: createElement
methods.description: Create a new element with the given name

methods.name: createComment
methods.description: Create a new comment node

methods.name: createTextNode
methods.description: Create a text node

methods.name: createCDATASection
methods.description: Create a new CDATA node

methods.name: createProcessingInstruction
methods.description: Create a ProcessingInstruction node given the specified name and data strings.

methods.name: normalize
methods.description: Normalize the document

methods.name: getElementsByTagName
methods.description: Returns a XMLNodeList of all the Elements with a given tag name in the order in which they are encountered in a preorder traversal of the XMLDocument tree.

methods.name: appendChild
methods.description: Adds the node newChild to the end of the list of children of this node. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: removeChild
methods.description: Removes the child node indicated by oldChild from the list of children, and returns it

methods.name: replaceChild
methods.description: Replaces the child node oldChild with newChild in the list of children, and returns the oldChild node. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.description: Inserts the node newChild before the existing child node refChild. If refChild is null, insert newChild at the end of the list of children. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: cloneNode
methods.description: Clone the node

methods.name: getChildNodes
methods.description: Get all children

methods.name: getAttributes
methods.description: A XMLNamedNodeMap containing the attributes of this Element.

methods.name: setAttribute
methods.description: Set a new attribute

methods.name: removeAttribute
methods.description: Remove atrribute with the given name

methods.name: hasAttribute
methods.description: Returns true if the attribute exists

methods.name: getElementsByTagName
methods.description: Returns a XMLNodeList of all the Elements with a given tag name in the order in which they are encountered in a preorder traversal of the current element tree.

methods.name: appendChild
methods.description: Adds the node newChild to the end of the list of children of this node. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: removeChild
methods.description: Removes the child node indicated by oldChild from the list of children, and returns it

methods.name: replaceChild
methods.description: Replaces the child node oldChild with newChild in the list of children, and returns the oldChild node. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.description: Inserts the node newChild before the existing child node refChild. If refChild is null, insert newChild at the end of the list of children. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: cloneNode
methods.description: Clone the node

methods.name: normalize
methods.description: Normalize the node

methods.name: getChildNodes
methods.description: Get all children

classes.name: XMLManager
classes.description: Main class to create xml document parser

methods.name: newDocument
methods.description: (Static) Create a new Empty XML document

methods.name: loadDocument
methods.description: (Static) Deprecated. Use XMLManager.fromString instead. Get the document for a given path using the default character encoding

methods.name: loadDocumentWithEncoding
methods.description: (Static) Deprecated. Use XMLManager.fromString instead. Get the document for a given path using the specified character encoding
methods.parameters: path: String, encoding: String, validate: boolean

methods.name: fromString
methods.description: (Static) Get the document for a given string content

methods.name: saveDocument
methods.description: (Static) Deprecated. Return the content as string instead using getDocumentContent. Save the document to a given path using the default character encoding
methods.parameters: document: XMLDocument, path: String, systemDtD: String, publicDtD: String

methods.name: saveDocumentWithEncoding
methods.description: (Static) Deprecated. Return the content as string instead using getDocumentContent. Save the document to a given path using the default character encoding
methods.parameters: document: XMLDocument, path: String, encoding: String, systemDtD: String, publicDtD: String

methods.name: validateDocument
methods.description: (Static) Validate a document without saving it
methods.parameters: document: XMLDocument, systemDtD: String, publicDtD: String

methods.name: getDocumentContent
methods.description: (Static) Get the document as string

classes.name: XMLNamedNodeMap
classes.description: Node map, usually used for attributes of an element

methods.name: item
methods.description: Get child at index

methods.name: getNamedItem
methods.description: Retrieves a node specified by name.

methods.name: appendChild
methods.description: Adds the node newChild to the end of the list of children of this node. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: removeChild
methods.description: Removes the child node indicated by oldChild from the list of children, and returns it

methods.name: replaceChild
methods.description: Replaces the child node oldChild with newChild in the list of children, and returns the oldChild node. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.description: Inserts the node newChild before the existing child node refChild. If refChild is null, insert newChild at the end of the list of children. If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.

methods.description: Clone the node

methods.description: Normalize the node
